successes.title: The Perfect Beer Drinking Vessel and Private Keg!
successes.description: Beer kept COLD, FRESH, and CARBONATED for 24 hrs. Crafted from 18/8 stainless steel, vacuum insulated Growler and Keg dispensing!

Pledges.description: Hall of Fame: Thanks for your support! Even if you aren't ready for a Drink Tank Growler you can still Drink the kool-aid, get updates and make the Hall of Fame on our website.
EARLY EARLY BIRDS SPECIAL: WOW! this is the lowest you will ever see the Drink Tanks Growler EVER. If you would ike the Keg Cap Tap system with this pledge add $30.00. Free Shipping with the USA.

EARLY BIRDS SPECIAL: 
Missed the First offer we got you covered. Drink Tanks Growler. If you would like The Keg Cap Tap system with this pledge add $30.00. Free shipping within the USA
Missed the last offer... No sweat, as the next 200 backers can receive a Drink Tanks Growler. If you would like The Keg Cap Tap system with this pledge add $30.00 . Free shipping in the USA

Last Call: Sometimes, you are just late to the party.... at least you can still pick up a Drink Tank Growler. If you would like The Keg Cap Tap system with this pledge add $30.00 . Free shipping within the USA.

The Party Pack: Two POWDER COATED "Black" Drink Tank Growlers with one standard lid and one Keg Cap Tap systyem as well as 4 limited "Kickstarter Edition" we teamed up with our friends at Sili Pint to offer this amazing Limited Edition. Continental US shipping included.
The Party Pack Plus: Includes 2 amazing Drink Tank Growler's POWDER COATED "BLACK" and TWO Keg Cap Tap system's w/accessories, and 8 Sili Pints  Free shipping in the USA.

THE BIG KAHUNAS... This includes the Party Pack Plus pledge AND You will have the opportunity to attend our World Premiere at The Great American Beer Festival (Oct. 10-12, 2013) as a VIP guest. You will be given honorable mention at the festival, lodging and admittance into the World Premiere is included. --Please email us for all the details--  (Airfare not included)
